title: Appointment data model based on HL7 equivalent resource
description: Smart Data Models for Appointment HL7/FHIR resource type

resourceType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/'. This is a Appointment resource

meta.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Meta'. The metadata about a resource. This is content in the resource that is maintained by the infrastructure. Changes to the content might not always be associated with version changes to the resource.

implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/uri'. String of characters used to identify a name or a resource

_implicitRules.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/code'. A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_language.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

text.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Narrative'. A human-readable summary of the resource conveying the essential clinical and business information for the resource.

contained.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/ResourceList'. These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope.

extension.description: Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Extension'. May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer can define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension.

items.description: Property. Id(s) of optional Extension(s) used by the resource. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Relationship. List of references to entities of type Extension

modifierExtension.description:
Relationship. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Extension'. May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it and/or the understanding of the containing element's descendants. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. To make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions.

Modifier extensions SHALL NOT change the meaning of any elements on Resource or DomainResource (including cannot change the meaning of modifierExtension itself).

items.description: Property. Id(s) of optional Extension(s) used by the resource. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. Relationship. List of references to entities of type Extension

identifier.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Identifier'. This records identifiers associated with this appointment concern that are defined by business processes and/or used to refer to it when a direct URL reference to the resource itself is not appropriate (e.g. in CDA documents, or in written / printed documentation).

items.description: An identifier - identifies some entity uniquely and unambiguously. Typically this is used for business identifiers.

status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/code'. A string which has at least one character and no leading or trailing whitespace and where there is no whitespace other than single spaces in the contents

_status.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

cancelationReason.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/CodeableConcept'. A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

serviceCategory.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/CodeableConcept'. A broad categorization of the service that is to be performed during this appointment.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

serviceType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/CodeableConcept'. The specific service that is to be performed during this appointment.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

specialty.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/CodeableConcept'. The specialty of a practitioner that would be required to perform the service requested in this appointment.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

appointmentType.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/CodeableConcept'. A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

reasonCode.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/CodeableConcept'. The coded reason that this appointment is being scheduled. This is more clinical than administrative.

items.description: A concept that may be defined by a formal reference to a terminology or ontology or may be provided by text.

reasonReference.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Reference'. Reason the appointment has been scheduled to take place, as specified using information from another resource. When the patient arrives and the encounter begins it may be used as the admission diagnosis. The indication will typically be a Condition (with other resources referenced in the evidence.detail), or a Procedure.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

priority.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/unsignedInt'. An integer with a value that is not negative (e.g. >= 0)

_priority.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

description.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/string'. A sequence of Unicode characters

_description.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

supportingInformation.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Reference'. Additional information to support the appointment provided when making the appointment.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

start.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/instant'. An instant in time - known at least to the second

_start.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

end.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/instant'. An instant in time - known at least to the second

_end.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

minutesDuration.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/positiveInt'. An integer with a value that is positive (e.g. >0)

_minutesDuration.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

slot.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Reference'. The slots from the participants' schedules that will be filled by the appointment.

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

created.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/dateTime'. A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month).  If hours and minutes are specified, a time zone SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored.                 Dates SHALL be valid dates.

_created.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

comment.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/string'. A sequence of Unicode characters

_comment.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

patientInstruction.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/string'. A sequence of Unicode characters

_patientInstruction.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Element'. Base definition for all elements in a resource.

basedOn.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Reference'. The service request this appointment is allocated to assess (e.g. incoming referral or procedure request).

items.description: A reference from one resource to another.

participant.description: Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Appointment_Participant'. List of participants involved in the appointment.

items.description: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s).

requestedPeriod.description:
Property. Model:'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/agaldemas/incubated/master/SMARTHEALTH/HL7/FHIR-R4/hl7-schema.json#/definitions/Period'. A set of date ranges (potentially including times) that the appointment is preferred to be scheduled within.

The duration (usually in minutes) could also be provided to indicate the length of the appointment to fill and populate the start/end times for the actual allocated time. However, in other situations the duration may be calculated by the scheduling system.

items.description: A time period defined by a start and end date and optionally time.

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be 'Appointment'
